pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
serverErrorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred on the server. Please try again later.
gatewayTimeoutMessage: Sorry, the server took too long to respond. Please try again later.
networkErrorMessage: Could not connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
permissionDeniedMessage: You do not have permission to access this page.
sessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
